meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>pregnant</kanji> <kanji>wife</kanji> is a <vocabulary>pregnant woman</vocabulary>.

妊婦 is a relatively formal term used to refer to a woman who is pregnant. In casual situations, it's common to add さん and say 妊婦さん to make it sound friendlier and more approachable.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
